answerText: transitivity [accept word forms][10] This type of relation is reflexive and symmetric as well as transitive. Its namesake classes form a partition of the domain.
heading: Western Invitational Tournament |2013 | Alabama + Georgia Tech+ WUStL | 4 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A group action with only one orbit is said to have this property. For 10 points each: [10] Name this property of a relation such that if a is related to b and b is related to c, then a is related to c.
